name: Glyphs
description:
Discover the wonderful world of glyphs, ligatures, and other characters with the Glyphs plugin. The plugin currently includes 184 Unicode Blocks.

Figma design and FigJam whiteboard are supported.


How to use:

  • Left-click on a glyph to paste onto the canvas or into the text layer(s).
  • Right-click on a glyph to copy to the clipboard.


Supported objects:

  • Texts;
  • Connectors;
  • Shapes with text (Square, Ellipse, Diamond, etc.);
  • Sticky notes;
  • "Code block" snippet (experimental).


Note:

Some fonts may not include all the characters that you see in the plugin. If you donâ€™t see a glyph after pasting, this means that the glyph doesn't exist in the font. Please select a glyph layer and select a different font in the Figma properties panel.


Known bug:

When inserting a glyph into the "Code block" snippet in FigJam, the code formatting (visual indentation) is lost.
